mapper.sql: lid, userid, logtype, function, logcontent, logtime, ip, remark
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT lid, l.userid as userid, logtype, function, logcontent, logtime, ip, l.remark,username from l, u where l.userid=u.userid
and lid in
'${item}'
and lid is null
order by logtime desc
mapper.insert:

( userid, logtype, function, logcontent, logtime, ip, remark ) values ( #{userid}, #{logtype}, #{function}, #{logcontent}, #{logtime}, #{ip}, #{remark} )
